result.eng: She was angry when she heard the news.
result.ga: Bhí fearg uirthi nuair a chuala sí an scéala
result.orig: Bhí fearg uirthi nuair a chuala sí an scéala
result.html: Bhí fearg uirthi nuair a chuala sí an scéalaShe was angry when she heard the news.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí fearg uirṫi nuair a ċuala sí an scéalaShe was angry when she heard the news.

result.eng: She was mad when she heard the work hadn't been done.
result.ga: Bhí sí ar buile nuair a chuala sí nach raibh an obair déanta
result.orig: Bhí sí ar buile nuair a chuala sí nach raibh an obair déanta
result.html: Bhí sí ar buile nuair a chuala sí nach raibh an obair déantaShe was mad when she heard the work hadn't been done.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí ar buile nuair a ċuala sí naċ raiḃ an obair déantaShe was mad when she heard the work hadn't been done.

result.eng: She heard his voice around noon.
result.ga: Chuala sí a ghuth um nóin
result.orig: Chuala sí a ghuth um nóin
result.html: Chuala sí a ghuth um nóinShe heard his voice around noon.
result.ponchtml: Ċuala sí a ġuṫ um nóinShe heard his voice around noon.

result.eng: She had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.
result.ga: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sin
result.orig: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sin
result.html: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sinShe had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.
result.ponchtml: Ċuala sí an scéal óna máṫair a ḃí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sinShe had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.

result.eng: Listen, did you hear the story?
result.ga: Cogar ar chuala tú an scéal
result.orig: Cogar ar chuala tú an scéal
result.html: Cogar ar chuala tú an scéalListen, did you hear the story?
result.ponchtml: Cogar ar ċuala tú an scéalListen, did you hear the story?

result.eng: Wait till you hear the news.
result.ga: Fan go gcloisfidh tú an scéal
result.orig: Fan go gcloisfidh tú an scéal
result.html: Fan go gcloisfidh tú an scéalWait till you hear the news.
result.ponchtml: Fan go gcloisfiḋ tú an scéalWait till you hear the news.

result.eng: Don't believe all you hear.
result.ga: Ná creid gach a gcloiseann tú
result.orig: Ná creid gach a gcloiseann tú
result.html: Ná creid gach a gcloiseann túDon't believe all you hear.
result.ponchtml: Ná creid gaċ a gcloiseann túDon't believe all you hear.

result.eng: I can't hear you!
result.ga: Ní chloisim thú
result.orig: Ní chloisim thú
result.html: Ní chloisim thúI can't hear you!
result.ponchtml: Ní ċloisim ṫúI can't hear you!

result.eng: I didn't hear that at all.
result.ga: Níor chuala mé é sin in aon chor
result.orig: Níor chuala mé é sin in aon chor
result.html: Níor chuala mé é sin in aon chorI didn't hear that at all.
result.ponchtml: Níor ċuala mé é sin in aon ċorI didn't hear that at all.

result.eng: I'm glad to hear that.
result.ga: Tá lúcháir orm sin a chloisteáil
result.orig: Tá lúcháir orm sin a chloisteáil
result.html: Tá lúcháir orm sin a chloisteáilI'm glad to hear that.
result.ponchtml: Tá lúċáir orm sin a ċloisteáilI'm glad to hear that.

result.eng: I can't hear anything now.
result.ga: Ní féidir liom rud ar bith a chloisteáil anois
result.orig: Ní féidir liom rud ar bith a chloisteáil anois
result.html: Ní féidir liom rud ar bith a chloisteáil anoisI can't hear anything now.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir liom rud ar biṫ a ċloisteáil anoisI can't hear anything now.

result.eng: I'm sorry to hear that.
result.ga: Tá brón orm sin a chloisteáil
result.orig: Tá brón orm sin a chloisteáil
result.html: Tá brón orm sin a chloisteáilI'm sorry to hear that.
result.ponchtml: Tá brón orm sin a ċloisteáilI'm sorry to hear that.

result.eng: I hear that that restaurant is nice.
result.ga: Cloisim go bhfuil an bhialann sin go deas
result.orig: Cloisim go bhfuil an bhialann sin go deas
result.html: Cloisim go bhfuil an bhialann sin go deasI hear that that restaurant is nice.
result.ponchtml: Cloisim go ḃfuil an ḃialann sin go deasI hear that that restaurant is nice.

result.eng: Can you hear me now?
result.ga: An gcloiseann tú anois mé
result.orig: An gcloiseann tú anois mé
result.html: An gcloiseann tú anois méCan you hear me now?
result.ponchtml: An gcloiseann tú anois méCan you hear me now?

result.eng: I'm sorry to hear that.
result.ga: Tá brón orm é sin a chloisteáil
result.orig: Tá brón orm é sin a chloisteáil
result.html: Tá brón orm é sin a chloisteáilI'm sorry to hear that.
result.ponchtml: Tá brón orm é sin a ċloisteáilI'm sorry to hear that.

result.eng: I couldn't hear anything for the horse's trot.
result.ga: Ní fhéadfainn rud ar bith a chloisint ag sodar an chapaill
result.orig: Ní fhéadfainn rud ar bith a chloisint ag sodar an chapaill
result.html: Ní fhéadfainn rud ar bith a chloisint ag sodar an chapaillI couldn't hear anything for the horse's trot.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḟéadfainn rud ar biṫ a ċloisint ag sodar an ċapaillI couldn't hear anything for the horse's trot.

result.eng: There were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.
result.ga: Bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leo
result.orig: Bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leo
result.html: Bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leoThere were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí daoine ann ċuala mé ag béiceaḋ iad aċ ní raiḃ mé in ann taḋall leoThere were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.

result.eng: She heard the screeching of the seagulls above the grey streets.
result.ga: Chuala sí scréachaíl na bhfaoileán os cionn na sráideanna liatha
result.orig: Chuala sí scréachaíl na bhfaoileán os cionn na sráideanna liatha
result.html: Chuala sí scréachaíl na bhfaoileán os cionn na sráideanna liathaShe heard the screeching of the seagulls above the grey streets.
result.ponchtml: Ċuala sí scréaċaíl na ḃfaoileán os cionn na sráideanna liaṫaShe heard the screeching of the seagulls above the grey streets.

result.eng: Everybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ga: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.orig: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.html: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ponchtml: Deir gaċ éinne a ḃí beo i 1963 gur cuiṁin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar ċuala siad faoi ḋúnṁarú an Uaċtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.

result.eng: I turned on the radio, as usual, to listen to the morning's news programme.
result.ga: Chuireas an raidió ar siúl mar ab iondúil chun nuachtchlár na maidine a chloisteáil
result.orig: Chuireas an raidió ar siúl mar ab iondúil chun nuachtchlár na maidine a chloisteáil
result.html: Chuireas an raidió ar siúl mar ab iondúil chun nuachtchlár na maidine a chloisteáilI turned on the radio, as usual, to listen to the morning's news programme.
result.ponchtml: Ċuireas an raidió ar siúl mar ab iondúil ċun nuaċtċlár na maidine a ċloisteáilI turned on the radio, as usual, to listen to the morning's news programme.

result.eng: I've never heard him being accused of stealing.
result.ga: Níor chuala mé gadaíocht curtha síos dó riamh
result.orig: Níor chuala mé gadaíocht curtha síos dó riamh
result.html: Níor chuala mé gadaíocht curtha síos dó riamhI've never heard him being accused of stealing.
result.ponchtml: Níor ċuala mé gadaíoċt curṫa síos dó riaṁI've never heard him being accused of stealing.

result.eng: I often heard my father talking about you.
result.ga: Is minic a chuala mé m'athair ag scéalaíocht ort
result.orig: Is minic a chuala mé m'athair ag scéalaíocht ort
result.html: Is minic a chuala mé m'athair ag scéalaíocht ortI often heard my father talking about you.
result.ponchtml: Is minic a ċuala mé m'aṫair ag scéalaíoċt ortI often heard my father talking about you.
